Package it.polimi.ingsw.model

package it.polimi.ingsw.model
  • Related Packages
    Package
    Description
    it.polimi.ingsw
     
    it.polimi.ingsw.model.characters
     
    it.polimi.ingsw.model.enumerations

  • Classes
    Class
    Description
    Assistant
    This class implements the game object Assistant at the beginning of each round the players must choose one of the 10(or the remaining) assistants
    AssistantDeck
    this class is the deck containing all the game's assistants
    Bag
    this class implements the bag containing the students (to be extracted from it)
    Cloud
    this class implements the game object cloud the clouds are filled with students at the beginning of each round
    Dashboard
    this class implements the game object Dashboard the dashboard contains the hall (with students and professor),the entrance (with students),and the towers the towers can be missing from the dashboard if you are not the team leader of your team (in a 4 players game)
    GameModel
    this is the main class of the game it contains the logic of the game itself the structure and all the info of the game is collected here It is an Observable.
    Island
    this class implements the game object island there are 12 islands in the game the islands can contain students,towers and mother nature the island's weight is an integer that specifies if the island is a merge of different single islands
    Player
    This class implements the game object Player A player is defined by name and id If the game is 4 players game the player can choose a team The player also chooses his tower color and his wizard At the beginning of each round the player also chooses an assistant
    Professor
    this class implements the game object professor
    Round
    This class implements the game object Round Each round is made by as many turns as the number of players in the game
    Student
    This class implements the game object Student A student is defined by its color
    Tower
    implements the game object tower
    Turn
    implement the game object Turn A turn is the sets of action the a player can make inside a round
